snippet: Under heavy domestic pressure from critics on both the right and left, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu promised action as he arrived back to a country battered by a wave of deadly violence.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu, upon his return home, announces series of measures meant to address string of attacks by Palestinians, in part due to domestic pressure from across political spectrum in wake of deadly violence; Netanyahu faces challenge of crafting proportionate response that will retaliate without sparking escalation.

byline.original: By ISABEL KERSHNER and JODI RUDOREN
byline.contributor: Rami Nazzal contributed reporting from Ramallah, West Bank, and Diaa Hadid from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: Under heavy domestic pressure from critics on both the right and left, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu promised action as he arrived back to a country battered by a wave of deadly violence.

headline.main: Israel’s Netanyahu Vows ‘Harsh Offensive’ in Response to Wave of Violence
headline.print_headline: Israel Vows ‘Harsh’ Response to Wave of Violence
